ROOT.GetZBYQID: select dcloud_id,dcloud_name from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_pwrtransfm_c c join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tdevice_pms_sx m on c.d5000_id=m.devicestrid where m.pmsid={0} and c.owner='610000'
ROOT.GetDLQID: select dcloud_id,dcloud_name from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_breaker_c c join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tdevice_pms_sx m on c.d5000_id=m.devicestrid where m.pmsid={0} and c.owner='610000'
ROOT.GetGLKGID: select dcloud_id,dcloud_name from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DIS_C c join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tdevice_pms_sx m on c.d5000_id=m.devicestrid where m.pmsid={0} and c.owner='610000'
ROOT.GetMXID: select dcloud_id,dcloud_name from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_busbar_c c join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tdevice_pms_sx m on c.d5000_id=m.devicestrid where m.pmsid={0} and c.owner='610000'
